machine_start_gcode:
; Orca Slicer Machine Start G-code
; ==============================================================================

G28              ; Home all axes
_GOTO_TRASH      ; Move to trash/purge location
LOAD_CELL_TARE   ; Tare the load cell sensor
M140 S{bed_temperature_initial_layer_single - 5} ; Set bed temp to be 5 degrees below wanted temp to prevent overshoot and waiting. 
M104 S140      ; Set nozzle temp

; --- Build Plate Dependent Z-Offset (ADDITIVE) ---
; Uses Z_ADJUST with MOVE=1 to ADD to the existing Load Cell Tare offset.
; This prevents overwriting the precise calibration done by LOAD_CELL_TARE.
; NOTE: Orca Slicer uses 'elsif' (Perl style), not 'elif' (Python style).

{if curr_bed_type == "Textured PEI Plate"}
    SET_GCODE_OFFSET Z_ADJUST=0.0001 MOVE=0
{elsif curr_bed_type == "Smooth Cool Plate"}
    SET_GCODE_OFFSET Z_ADJUST=0.0001 MOVE=0
{elsif curr_bed_type == "Engineering Plate"}
    SET_GCODE_OFFSET Z_ADJUST=0.0001 MOVE=0
{elsif curr_bed_type == "Smooth High Temp Plate"}
    SET_GCODE_OFFSET Z_ADJUST=0.0001 MOVE=0
{elsif curr_bed_type == "Textured Cool Plate"}
    SET_GCODE_OFFSET Z_ADJUST=0.0001 MOVE=0
{elsif curr_bed_type == "Cool Plate (SuperTack)"}
    SET_GCODE_OFFSET Z_ADJUST=0.0001 MOVE=0
{endif}

; --- Show Color Selection Dialog When Required ---
; To prevent the color selection dialog from appearing at the start of a print if not required.
; Checks if there are filament changes (toolchanges > 0).
; If yes, runs verbose (SILENT=0). If single filament, runs silent (SILENT=1).

{if total_toolchanges > 0}
    SAVE_ZMOD_DATA SILENT=0
{else}
    SAVE_ZMOD_DATA SILENT=1
{endif}

; --- KAMP (Adaptive Mesh) Settings ---
SET_GCODE_VARIABLE MACRO=_KAMP_Settings VARIABLE=purge_height VALUE={first_layer_height}
SET_GCODE_VARIABLE MACRO=_KAMP_Settings VARIABLE=purge_amount VALUE=20

; --- Start Print Macro ---
; START_PRINT BED_TEMP= EXTRUDER_TEMP= FORCE_LEVELING= FORCE_KAMP= Z_OFFSET= SKIP_ZOFFSET= SKIP_LEVELING= MESH=
; We pass temperatures here.
; We DO NOT pass Z_OFFSET here because we handled it additively above.
START_PRINT EXTRUDER_TEMP=[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer] BED_TEMP=[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single]

; --- Final Heat & Stats ---
PLAY_MIDI FILE=Beverey_Hills_Cop.mid          ; Play completion/start tune
SET_PRINT_STATS_INFO TOTAL_LAYER=[total_layer_count]

; End Start G-Code
; ==============================================================================
name: My Flashforge AD5X 0.4 nozzle
